text: Rainer Basedow (20 May 1938 â€“ 15 May 2022) was a German actor. He was known for having provided the German voice dub of Pumbaa in the Lion King franchise. He also dubbed John Belushi as Jake Blues in The Blues Brothers and Sergeant Harley in The Jungle Book. Basedow died on 15 May 2022 at a hospital in Salzburg, Austria from a heart attack, five days before his 84th birthday. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1938 births Category:2022 deaths Category:German movie actors Category:German television actors Category:German voice actors Category:German stage actors Category:People from Saxony Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction
title: Rainer Basedow
